page.title: 12EPPING FOREST IN B. HILL
page.content: In our block we have patches of Epping Forest. It is very popular for riding,taking walks,boating and dog walking.Riding in the Forest is allowed but only on the special tracks.Boating is also allowed but only on certain lakes such as Connaught Water (Chingford).Epping Forest is only approximatly a tenth of its original size because the rest of it has been built on.In 1882 Queen Victoria gave the Forest to the people of London and since then it has been a very popular place.Parts of the Forest have been separated from each other such as Lords Bushes.
